InputEventGetTargetRanges.summary: The getTargetRanges() method of the interface returns an array of objects that will be affected by a change to the DOM if the input event is not canceled.

remarks.para: This allows web apps to override text edit behavior before the browser modifies the DOM tree, and provides more control over input events to improve performance.
Depending on the value of inputType and the current editing host, the expected return value of this method varies:
